ygData.subject: RE: Salting
ygData.msgSnippet: No, it s not from players salting the spiders. Ever since Beta Phase 4 an occasional spider would cough up halfling parts. I got them mostly from large spiders
ygData.messageBody:
No, it's not from players salting the spiders. Ever since Beta Phase 4 an
occasional spider would cough up halfling parts. I got them mostly from
large spiders in East Commonlands. Might be some odd joke by one of the
world builders or something... Dunno.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: RON_TALBOT@...
8)[mailto:RON_TALBOT@...]
8)Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 11:56 AM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] Salting
8)
8)
8)From: RON_TALBOT@...
8)
8) I was fighting spiders in E. Karana a while back and got
8)'Halfling
8) parts" as loot. (eeuuww) Twice. Quite a shock. I think
8)it was salted
8) by someone with a wicked sense of humor but I'm not 100
8)percent sure.
8) It is conceivable that a giant spider would have Halfling parts
8) (Samwise, where is Frodo anyway...) but I haven't seen
8)this extreme
8) level of humor before from variant. Anyone else have a similar
8) experience?
8)
8) Bujold 18th
8) Xegony
8)

8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twinking (Was Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER*
8)Author: Non-HP-scott (scott@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
8)Date: 7/22/99 9:47 AM
8)
8)
8)From: scott@... (scott brisko)
8)
8)Yes you can place items on mobs. Often times when I forage
8)something, or
8)just got done looting a mob, and another agro mob attacks, I
8)simply click
8)the item to the mod, kill it then retrieve the items.
8)
8)Which if bards had a more permanent charm song could really
8)make a mean pack
8)animal/monster exploit.
8)
8)Bernwyn
